overview: Set in 11 Russian cities, this topsy-turvy New Year's tale of love and miracles proves the six degrees of separation theory, under which everyone is just six steps away, by way of introduction, from any other person in the world. The diverse set of characters includes a taxi driver, a pop diva, a thief, a cop and even the President of Russia.
tagline: You are just six steps away from a miracle
title: Yolki: Six Degrees of Celebration
